Reviews.Title: “Worse than terrible”
Reviews.Author: Hakan B
Reviews.Content: business trip barcelona cities world trip started terrible recommend please stay worst experience minibar water staff air conditioner cooler heating system 2 elevators front desk terrible blanket towel pillow

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place, friendly and good value”
Reviews.Author: HaimBadash
Reviews.Content: 2 stayed sunday thursday hotel nice clean clean beautifully bathroom breakfast wonderfull tasty service fine werent english speakers tried understand hotel located center metro station near hotel witch 7 minutes placa catalonia city main square near hotel lot local restaurants shops prices low highly recommened sum recommend

Reviews.Title: “!DO NOT GO !”
Reviews.Author: ghazala_ishaq12
Reviews.Content: star hotel swimming pool half water dirty disgusting pipe swimming pool dripping water bathroom cramped hotel main road noisey impossible depressing cant smile save someones life fridge advise leaflets help phone local food tv hotel cleaners lovely people feel welcomed

Reviews.Title: “Good value and convenient location”
Reviews.Author: Gail T
Reviews.Content: stayed short break november 2011 scouring internet suitable value hotel decent surprised arrival centre subway station immediately opposite simple busy traffic street hotel quiet location enjoy walking safe walk sea cathedral walk pouring rain streets discovered wonderful hospital reconstruction green wooded park hilltop fort reaching guell park discovered trams leave coast hotel return centre day didnt eat hotel selection restaurantscafes adjacent theres supermarket road spacious fairly modern clean quiet staff pleasant helpful

Reviews.Author: kos i
Reviews.Content: allthe staff tall security kitchen staff didnt wear waiters removed plates finished pcs brokenthe toilet door elevator doors card easy break inthe sheets disguisting werent changed firmly believe hotel dont reccommend

Reviews.Title: “Nice modern hotel”
Reviews.Author: Thrilled_2_Travel
Reviews.Content: arrived beautiful comfortable via glass door elevator drawback temperature heater tried cool avail reception desk assistance told window cool 10 minutes dont air conditioning didnt cool stated cold temperature differences offer free wifi enjoyed delicious breakfast hotel located close subway station

Reviews.Title: “Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Shmuel B
Reviews.Content: i’d visit hotel emphasize major 1 comfortable clean 2 free wifi services excellent 3 breakfast reach variety choices 4 front desk helpful 5 hotel location near underground helpful

Reviews.Title: “If you can sleep here, you're either deaf or drunk.”
Reviews.Author: Bill B
Reviews.Content: hotel inside drum night hear footsteps own floor ones beneath doors shut loud bang doors shut properly spent 5 nights staff try 3 equally loud especially regards noises hotel city barcelona people arrive till morning leave planes getting sleep hotel matter minutes hours apart worn stains walls ceilings cracked tiles moisture bathroom minibar extra charge safe amazingly staff helpfull

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: pj2538
Reviews.Content: serious bed bug avoid worst stayed life checked discovered door didnt lock called complain front desk denied broken booked stay anyway day complained bothered door lock broken moved biggest bed bugs itchy 4 nights stayed absolutely disgraceful bed bug issue itchy itchy itchy dirty sheets linen addition walls paper thin easily hear people including doors slamming late night keeping awake bed bugs crawling 1 2 star absolute avoid

Reviews.Title: “Welcoming staff made stay a pleasure”
Reviews.Author: EJBluefolds
Reviews.Content: friendliest hotels stayed world arrived normal check time welcome luggage locked safely allow enjoy city map suggestions move town metro returned hotel busy feel special handled promptly voucher free drink bar size balcony bed comfortable breakfast following morning buffet amazing range food offer choice suit anyones taste able leave luggage secure plane evening receptionists trained enjoy jobs hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfect compromise”
Reviews.Author: widok
Reviews.Content: time visited hotel 2010 conference decided barcelona holidays chioce simple course hotel offers perfect compromise price location comfort minutes train station starting car trips additionaly speaking english staff fantastic view 11th floor swimming pool

Reviews.Title: “Good price for a simple and nice hotel, not in the center, but right next to the metro station”
Reviews.Author: ofersan
Reviews.Content: hotel located heart barcelona clot station 10 min walk la segrada familia breakfast reach hotel free wifi internet connection signal nice pool top floor nice view barcelona id

Reviews.Title: “4 stars ... on what planet???”
Reviews.Author: Tommy_da_cat
Reviews.Content: poorly decorated cheap wood veneer flooring badly fitted curtains upholstery fashioned tv bathroom adequate exactly pleasant staff slow particularly polite location metro station outside swimming pool pathetic 3m 3m breakfast buffet passable poor choice cereal hot food greasy coffee etc ive stayed 4 bad ive stayed 2 hotels nicer avoid

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Vacation”
Reviews.Author: cemilyplay
Reviews.Content: boyfriend experience despite reading reviews feeling bit skeptical staff accommodated efficiently requested 6th floor read larger walked sagrada familia 1015 mins shops restaurants close fed late nights huge bonus reasons chose hotel close door visited 58 metro stops total transfers breakfast morning abundant choices hot cold sweet savoury staff gracious clean tied beds 2 twin beds beside sleep close tight sundeck roof nice weather pool dip cool tanning highly recommend hotel value convenience quality

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: Godfroid
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel april 2010 3 nights impressed metro station clot train station airports train arrived reception speak english noisy italian receptionist nice italian balcony clean towels changed day personal friendly day check left luggage reception free hotel 2 metro station sagrada familia 5 6 stations center la rambla highly recommend hotel zone clean safe little bit noisy theres qualityprice hotels street stores till midnight nice story arrival hotel 23rd april st georges day celebrated holiday catalunya receptionist rose girlfriend idea holiday boys flowers girls
